website_summaries.verdict: Consider this set a steal for out-sharpening its competitors and arriving with a few add ons.
pros: We love that all kinds of hands, including left and right ones, can easily work with these knives and with high-efficiency
We love that in one use, you can instantly upgrade your slicing ability
cons: Can feel a bit flimsy for some, however most note the set's high quality

customer_reviews.title: The grab and feel are good too. Just remember don't put them in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I came across the product while searching for something else. It is a very reasonable price so I want to give it a try as my bread knife is not very sharp anymore. The quality of the product exceeds my expectation. They are really sharp. They are ceramic and I have heard that they don't become blunt quickly. The grab and feel are good too. Just remember don't put them in the dish washer and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Icela

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: While the knives are sharp, and comfortable in the hand, the blade only extends about an inch into the handle (at least with the smaller paring knife) and as a result the handle broke off while cutting some cheese, the blade nearly hitting me. Sadly, I can not recommend these knives to anybody else as this design flaw makes them dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what sharp knives! My hands are on the small side so typical kitchen knives are either too big, too heavy. These are perfect for different jobs in the kitchen. I was little concerned because I have never used a ceramic knives before but they are just as sharp but half the weight! I have heard of people dropping it or questioned on how to sharpen it but use your common sense and you will be fine. I never put them in the dishwasher and I wipe them dry after hand washing. Haven't had to sharpen them but after another week or so I'll use my ceramic v shaped sharpener lightly to keep the edge.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp knives and packed in a nice box - giftable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister-in-law as a present. She loves these. The packing is very beautiful - like Apple product! I only cut veggies with it and it works great. Be VERY CAREFUL - these knives are extremely sharp. My friend cut his finger and it went to the bone in one instant. If it can cut into bone, it can cut anything. DO NOT LET KIDS operate this. Also, since they are ceramic, they will break if you abuse them. So be gentle.
customer_reviews.author: KalShar

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Knives
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time trying ceramic-blade knives. These knives are very sharp and handle quite well. The green-handled knife seems "off." It isn't as sharp and when I have to cut something tougher and round (such as beets), the green-handled knife always cuts crooked, rather than straight-through; it's as though the blade is sharpened in a strange way. However, the other knives all cut straight and true through anything. In general, these knives are a very good addition to your kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: J Sherman

customer_reviews.title: A decent Knife Set well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: A decent knife set well worth the money that you pay. The blades are very sharp but not excessively so. The blades are a little thinner at the back then what I would like. They are ceramic so you have to be more careful with them anyway. This is not $100 professional chef knife but it's more than adequate for most home use even picky connoisseurs will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim1960

customer_reviews.title: Great set, love the various blades!
customer_reviews.text: Not the first ceramic knife set, but I do like this one a lot! First because of the variety of knives that come with it, second because the handles are made with non slip materials and the blades seem to be set into handles very well (I had knives where the blade came out of the handle within first few uses). Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Panchenko

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Sharp at All.
customer_reviews.text: These ceramic knives are not as sharp as Kyocera ceramic knife I have. (I tested them on zucchinis) And my dull Global knives cut more easily and better than these knives. If one is looking for some sharp ceramic kitchen knives, these are not the right knives. I rated three stars for their reasonable price, not for their functionality.
customer_reviews.author: michaeltdc

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives. I saw that people had issues with them being damaged when received, but I took a chance. They were in perfect condition when I bought them. I have been very careful with them, but I did break the tip on one. ☹️ I hit the knife on a glass cutting board and it broke. I am still very happy with the purchase and may replace the one I broke eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa K

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 1st use, chopping onions
customer_reviews.text: I have been using ceramic knives exclusively for about 3 years now. I recently moved abroad and wanted to get a new set to bring with me. They looked great and I left them in their box during my trip. First time I go to use the chef's knife it chipped not once but twice, cutting and onion?? Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and nice
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and nice. The knives are light and sharp. It's easy to cut any kind of the stuff. As you can see the video, I cut a cake there is hard jam inside, but I just cut so easy and keep section clear! But really need more attention and carefully because it's really very,very sharp. I I would like to say everyone must have in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Amazing knives!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I love the all black look. I bought them to replace my old set that kept chipping on the blades. I've had these about a month now, use them every night when I cook and wash them in the dishwasher. So far they have held up great and are VERY sharp. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Riley

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Never thought that that I would like ceramic knives, these are better than my expensive knives. May never go back. **Update** Year later the knives are just ok. The paring knife tip broke off in the first 2 months that I had disappointed but not a problem. The black paint on the handles are slowly coming off. The 4 inch knife handle's black paint in almost all gone and is showing all red. FYI I wash all my knives by hand and do not let them sit in water.
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Garbage, not ceramic
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. These aren't ceramic. They chip easily. You're better off with one ceramic knife rather than a set of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knives in December 2018, so I have had them about 4 months. They are sharp, easy to handle and I really liked them. The reason for 2 stars is because today when I was cutting raw steak, the handle completely broke in half! I'm sure just a flaw in the material, but unable to contact anyone for a possible replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This set looks like it will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. They look very good, are sharp and lay well in my hand. Time will tell how they hold up, but I've had ceramic knives before and they stayed sharp for literally years! They are great especially for veggies, lettuce etc. The only thing you have to watch out for is not to drop them on a tiled floor, because then they can break (happened to me once - the tip broke off). This set looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: shoppersusy

customer_reviews.title: Dull quick
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm not horribly impressed with these knives. They are easy to handle and fairly easy to clean, but they don't stay sharp long. Heaven forbid you cut something right on your granite countertop. They dull out very quickly even on bamboo cutting boards. So, we sharpen about every other time. The plus side is that the plastic covers are nice and snug and I don't have to worry about anyone in my house pulling one out of the drawer and hurting themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Only stayed sharp for 2 months...and chips super easy
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several ceramic knives from different manufacturers in the past. These were definitely on the very very very cheap side. They only stayed sharp for about 2 months and seemed to chip easier than most of the other ceramic knives that I've owned. I wonder if the company will give a refund or replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Al D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!!
customer_reviews.text: My friend suggested me to get this knifes set cause it's very useful! When I received this package is very light weight, after I open it, wow, what a beautiful set. The knife itself super light and so easy to cut the fruits and vegetables. First day I tied the pineapple, usually some knife not that easy to cut the pineapple skin, as I bought so many knives and try it by myself, trust me, this knife really tells the different! So easy to clean and storage! I'll recommend this knife set!
customer_reviews.author: Neta

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, firm and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a few weeks ago and I am in love! These knives are super sharp and durable - and you don't have to worry about rust! I like the fact that each knife has a cover for the blade to protect it and yourself. Easy to clean and store. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp and light weight knives set
customer_reviews.text: I have received this knives set about 2 weeks and use it everyday. They are super sharp and light weight as it advertised. The first dish I made by this knives set was shredded potato salad! If you don't have a sharp knife, it will take you lots of time on cutting! And this time is the fastest time ever. I also try the bread knife to cut the side of my toast when I'm making japanse style sandwich...super sharp and easy! Love each knife has its own case to make it easier when I put them in the drawer and no worry that we will accidentally get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen T

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A good knife set for the price. Good grip, balance. Drawbacks: blade point at bottom of blade on handle end should be dulled as it tends to poke fingers. I wish blades were fluted so whatever I’m slicing would fall away from the blade instead of clinging.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I like them - didn't realize I was using such awfully ...
customer_reviews.text: These are some very, very sharp knives. I like them - didn't realize I was using such awfully dull knives until I started using these. I have cut myself twice already, so be very careful. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Gma

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of ceramic knifes
customer_reviews.text: Received this knife set about a week ago and was already impressed with the quality out of the box. The set looks stylish with the black ceramic blades and the silicone-feel handles. I also like that each knife has its own sheath so I can just toss them inside my knife drawer without worrying chips or getting cut. After using them for about a week, I like them more as they are sharp! They cut through meat with ease. I also like the smallest one for cutting fruits. They meet all my expectations and the price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These were a great gift. They were packaged nicely. I was able to wrap them in the box they came in. They are nice quality. Priced perfectly. Shipped quickly. I would definitely recommend these knifes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My wife keeps telling me how great these knives are. We have had ceramic knives before, but she likes these ones even more. Therefore, I must pass on a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great Product ~ Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: What wonderful knives & pealer. Super sharp, they fit your hand nicely. Would highly recommend. I have a couple other ceramic knives from a high end name & I like the feel of these in my hand better. They are just as sharp as well.
customer_reviews.author: CLady

customer_reviews.title: So far these are working great!
customer_reviews.text: Received it 3 days ago, it might be a little early to give a review but so far the knives are working great! I have been using 2 of those for the last 3 days without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sonam Pansari

customer_reviews.title: Quality control missing
customer_reviews.text: Loved the handling and sharpness of the largest knife, but when I went to use the next smaller knife the love evaporated. It was as if the finish honing was not done. Edge was visibly different from the others. Guess I'll get to see if the sharpener I have on order will actually do ceramic knives.
customer_reviews.author: BNPTTC

customer_reviews.title: For people who can't take care of metal knives
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these. My girlfriend and I are really horrible at taking care of our knives...they sometimes end up sitting in soapy water for a few days, which leads to rusty, nasty knives that we can't use! Enter the Coiwin ceramic knives...these things don't rust and have stayed SUPER sharp over the last few months of use/abuse. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catcher of Pokemon (Like No One Ever Was)

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Best ceramic knives I've owned and those are all I buy now. LOVE that they are black. Other have more handle than they need imo. Nice grip fins on the handle too. I might buy a send set.
customer_reviews.author: gira

customer_reviews.title: They are so sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives. I had one for a really long time that I eventually wore out. So I bought a set. I don’t know why but they seem to cut better than regular knives.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great knives, handles are gracefully swept upward. And tactile to the touch.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife set. Exactly as described, and exceptionally priced. Boxing is nice. Sheathing is simple and very practical. Great fitting. Highly recommend this knives.
customer_reviews.author: ThomasL

customer_reviews.title: The blades chip under normal use
customer_reviews.text: These knives have been good and remain sharp. However 2 of the 4 have had the blades chip in places. My wife won’t use them anymore for fear they would chip again and the chips will end up in the food.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: had a tip break the second time using this set
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend. very disappointed. I work with a catering company and got this kit for my personal set. they are poor quality and had a blade tip break the second time using this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice blades, weak handles
customer_reviews.text: Great blades...had these for almost two years. The joint between blade and handle is the weak link..:my 2 smaller knives of the set broke there. The blade was still fine, but useless without its plastic handle. For the amount of use I got from them, and the fact the two big ones are still going strong, I’m considering buying replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Shane McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as before
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same knife set a couple of years ago, and it seems like this set isn't as sharp as the first one was.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: After couple months of using it it’s not sharp anymore and the handle is pilling off
customer_reviews.author: Dima

customer_reviews.title: great product at great price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive knife set for my RV and these knives filled the bill. they hold their edge, are easy to handle and are lightweight....exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Steve the Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Breaks under normal use
customer_reviews.text: The knife was very sharp. There was no problem there. But the first time I used it the knife chipped in several spots. I do not suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy PerryTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: One of the knives broke to easy.
customer_reviews.text: While cutting an onion, the little knife broke on the handle. Barely ever used this one...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hofmann

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my daughter for Christmas, she said it was her favorite gift. She buys whole carrots instead of peeled so she can use the peeler.
customer_reviews.author: William R Tate

customer_reviews.title: Break really easily!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the knifes but now I have 2 broken blades!! I treat my knifes great and never abuse them. One broke just laying on counter and cutting board rolled over in and then another broke while I was washing it???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knives for the price
customer_reviews.text: As the headline says, these knives are great for the price. They, obviously, aren't "professional" knives, but for around $20, you won't find a better set. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S

customer_reviews.title: If you’re on the fence about ceramics...look no further!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. I’ve heard great things about ceramic knives for awhile and have been looking for some on and off for the last few months. Saw this set and then saw the price and figured I had nothing to lose... let me tell you, worth the money. In fact, I would’ve paid twice what they cost for them had I needed to. Beautiful colors, lightweight, seriously sharp. So glad I took the chance on these things. Going to order a few more sets as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Leah McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: So good! Extremely happy with the quality of these knifes...be careful, very sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Rainey Addington

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality product
customer_reviews.text: Ordering this set of ceramic knives was an object lesson in the old adage "You get what you pay for." I have there ceramic knives and expected these to be of comparable quality, but they weren't even close. These were dull compared to others of much better quality, that not surprisingly, cost more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent knives at a great cost
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for new knives and I found this ceramic knife set. I feel like it is a good value. It is very easy to hold. I feel I can cut anything and also cut very thin slices. The knife set comes with safety cover which make easy to store. They are excellent knives at a great cost.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Wife said order these, so I did.
customer_reviews.text: We had a few of theses and they have dulled over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Bob0a

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of ceramic knives.And I believe I picked a good one.Knives are sharp. I like the way the knives are a little longer near the handle to help keep your fingers from sliding over the sharp blade.Clean easily and look good.
customer_reviews.author: tbear

customer_reviews.title: Not theSharpest Knife in the Drawer.
customer_reviews.text: These are sharp when you get them, and we followed their instructions on how to use them, but they dulled faster than we think they should have. They don't sharpen on regular sharpeners for steel knifes, so will now have to order a ceramic sharpener. Were going to buy same set for a relative, but won't now.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my knives
customer_reviews.text: Fallout 4 great happy with all the way that operates order was delivered Timely
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S Stough

customer_reviews.title: They are sharp
customer_reviews.text: They work great and feel good to hold when cutting
customer_reviews.author: kim kinzel

customer_reviews.title: VERY FRAGILE
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE GREAT KNIVES ..BUT DO NOT DROP THEM THEY BREAK..WHICH MEANS THE CERAMIC IS TOO THIN....AND FRAGILE
customer_reviews.author: Herman Rosen  HERMAN ROSEN

customer_reviews.title: Alright....
customer_reviews.text: These ceramic knives were what I really wanted to not have to sharpen knives and worry about dullness. They worked ok, another brand I have tried works better but these work ok as well. They get the job done and a potate peeler is a plus!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Monday

customer_reviews.title: Sharpness(Dull)
customer_reviews.text: The knifes are very dull the are not sharp at all I should have sent them back they are not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set and great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Sharper than the ceramic that I bought at Walmart, a lot sharper.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Buller

customer_reviews.title: Cuts well
customer_reviews.text: Cuts well and cleans easy. Just started using them so I will see how long the edge keeps sharp
customer_reviews.author: RYAN P.

customer_reviews.title: Does not perform. Blunt and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These knives are very blunt and flimsy. I had trouble cutting green beans and carrots with them. Sending them back right away!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: It is good product. Best knife I have ever used for ...
customer_reviews.text: It is good product. Best knife I have ever used for preparing food. Great ceramic blade points and ceramic body builds the knife body part and the handle is rubber made and comfortable to hold. I cut vegetables and fruits with it, sharp and durable. Easy clean and Light weighted.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina wu

customer_reviews.title: Really fine knives.
customer_reviews.text: These are mid level quality. Yet they are very good knives. I like these knives so much I may buy some more in the best quality available. Ceramic is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Easily broken. Cutting an onion and the a peice of the knife broke off. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice knife set. It's well packaged and displayed. I use mine daily, and I've also given several sets as gifts. Those who received them as gifts, were really pleased, as well.
customer_reviews.author: tohearwell

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set of super sharp knives for a very reasonable ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of super sharp knives for a very reasonable price. The colored handles make them easy to find in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Tips and handle may break.
customer_reviews.text: Within a month, a tip broke, after less than a year the blade snapped out of the handle. Even the black coating on the handle started to rub off and reveal a bright neon green plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Stromsta

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting ceramic knives
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting ceramic knives. These work perfect on anything from steak to a tomato. They cut cleanly and effortlessly. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Superbean

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: These knives are fantastic! You can't beat the price for the quality. They have stayed sharp and none have chipped so far. Our ceramic knives get used daily and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shel R

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Best knives just get a sharpener that is made for ceramic knives and never use a regular knife sharpener it will chip the blade
customer_reviews.author: Julieth

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality; the tips chipped off on first use. But I guess for the price, I’m not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: chemcat

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I found that only the paring knife was sharp. I guess the bigger the knife, the thicker it has to be and therefore, shouldn't expect it to be sharp. I would buy the paring knife by itself, but not the set in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp and so lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for our office kitchen because of the price. I used the small knife to cut the tape off of my bunch of organic bananas and the knife went right through and sliced up my finger. I didn't even realize how deep it was until the blood came out. Super sharp and so lightweight, I hardly felt it cut me!! Definitely buying a set for my house now. 10/10 recommend for sharpness. Would have given 5 stars but I may have to get a stitch.
customer_reviews.author: GFG

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and good quality for the price.  Hand wash only.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that they aren't bright assorted colors and actually match normal decorations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, nice knives. Not super durable but great for price
customer_reviews.text: I use these knives everyday. I have had them for about a month and one has already chipped, but given the price I have no regrets. Quite nice, I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice set and great value. So far like it and like having the knife guards too.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Snider

customer_reviews.title: They do not stay sharp over time.
customer_reviews.text: It will pay to look into a more expensive knife set as these get dull over time
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Not Sharp
customer_reviews.text: These knives are not sharp! The handle is narrow. They are so narrow that you have to be careful not to hurt yourself. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: e bass

customer_reviews.title: Not that sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive knives, only as sharp as a lazily sharpened steel knife. Think I'll stick with steel in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and great for slicing.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality thus far for a reasonable price. Great for slicing fruit, vegetables, raw fish and meat. Haven't had the opportunity to use the serrated bread knife yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazin2Grace

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and great
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were looking for a good set of ceramic knives to be out first knife set, and these did not disappoint! They’re very sharp, and very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A good nice set
customer_reviews.text: I don't do a lot of cooking. I really wanted to try some ceramic knives and I have really enjoyed these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great knife set! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife, is light, sharp, easy to clean. It feels great in the hand and is always sharp. The thin blade slices through everything with no effort at all. I really like how this knife feels in my hand. It's lightweight and very well balanced, allowing me to make sure, even slices.
customer_reviews.author: HC Y.

customer_reviews.title: Broken in a Week
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for one week,2 of them are already broken. I’m disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: BURAK

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING KNIVES
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these knives since August- nearly every day, and have yet to have any issues with them! In fact, Im buying a second set as well. If you love sleek looking, light weight, heavy duty, extremely sharp ceramic knifes, for an extremely affordable price, THESE are for you! (The only con is that they will break if used on extremely hard objects like an avocado pit).
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: there were no knife for bread :( instead there was a potato cleaner
customer_reviews.text: there were no knife for bread :( instead there was a potato cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Aram

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Attractive knives with a nice handle but they are flimsy. The tip of one of my knives has broken already
customer_reviews.author: MirandaHobbs

customer_reviews.title: The blades are slightly thicker than other ceramics we have and they seem fairly sturdy. I'm hopeful they'll have less chipping
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as sharp as other ceramic knives we've purchased, but still about as sharp as an average quality steel knife run through a sharpener 5 or 6 times. The blades are slightly thicker than other ceramics we have and they seem fairly sturdy. I'm hopeful they'll have less chipping.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed first time we used one the tip just broke off. Cutting chicken another one a piece in the middle broke.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best ceramic knives I’ve used. Great set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and dull
customer_reviews.text: Inreallynwanted to love these knives. One of the knives showed up with the tip already broken, then I broke it further during the first handwash. They’re really not that great of knives. Chopping requires force. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zevahc

customer_reviews.title: it feel like feather it's so light but it is sharp
customer_reviews.text: Be careful!!! This knife is very sharp!!! When I got this one,it feel like feather it's so light but it is sharp.I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: amingolee66

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price these work well. Would order more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moms love it
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a Christmas gift for my mother. Her last set broke. She loves these new ones
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Hargis

customer_reviews.title: always sharp
customer_reviews.text: always holds a sharp edge, good for slicing vegetables and fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Big Fred

customer_reviews.title: Affordable ceramic knives.
customer_reviews.text: Cutting with these is a dream come true. I could never afford pricey ceramic knives, but these are affordable and don't sacrifice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patel Family

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: feels great, cuts great, but chips easily. One of the blades has already chipped after using it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: I had a ceremaic knife before, but it chipped, so I start to look for another one. I decided to try Coiwen. The set is very nice. Each knife has a cover. You will need it, the blade is very sharp. knife itself is very light, easy to handle. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Broke after second use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom and one broke while she was cutting potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Durability Sucks
customer_reviews.text: These knives were great, very sharp. BUT after 1.5 years with light usage, one of the knives broke away from the handle today. So, durability sucks! Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Rob in South Florida

customer_reviews.title: Has a good edge. For the price can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: They cut. Has a good edge. For the price can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Allen K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves to cook. She really likes this set and uses it daily
customer_reviews.author: Randall

product_meta.title: Coiwin Kitchen Cutlery Ceramic Knife Set with Sheaths Super Sharp and Rust Proof and Stain Resistant (6" Bread Knife, 6" Chef Knife, 5" Utility Knife, 4" Fruit Knife), Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black Blade - 4 PiecesAbout Coiwin: In order to get the great products and fast FBA service, please make sure the products you buy are sold by Bthaini. The secret to cooking beautiful & delicious food is in the knives you use have you ever used a ceramic knife before? If not, you're in for a treat the Bthaini ceramic knives effortlessly slice through food unlike any traditional knives you've used in the past. Stainless steel knives require sharpening on a regular basis, but this ceramic knife set was designed to stay ultra-sharp over long periods of time. Plus, our premium ceramic knives are rust-proof and stain-resistant, which means they were made to last a lifetime features and benefits, FDA approve, BPA free, germ-resistant, hygiene, lightweight, ultra-sharp, stain-proof, never wears, never rusts, never corrodes, easy to clean, ergonomic designs, no chemical leakage, leaves no aftertaste, no browning or oxidizing food, impervious to acids, oils and odour note 1.Ceramic knives should be used on silicone, wooden, plastic or bamboo cutting boards. Using on glass, marble or tile could cause the blades to chip or break. 2. Ideal for cutting fruit, vegetables and boneless meats. Do no use these knives for carving, chopping, boning or prying. 3. Do not put your knives in the dish washer. Do not use your hand to try the blade of the ceramic knife, it is dangerous. Package included 1 x 6" chef knife with sheath 1 x 6" bread knife with sheath 1 x 5" utility knife with sheath 1 x 4" fruit knife with sheath 1 x elegant gift box.
feature_bullets: COMES WITH SAFETY COVERS – These knives are extremely sharp. For safety purposes, we’ve included four sheaths that fit snugly over each knife, preventing any accidental contact with the blades. Each blade cover is a different size, designed specifically to fit the unique shape of its corresponding blade. When not in use, store these professional knives with their sheaths in place.

LIGHTWEIGHT, ERGONOMIC CUTLERY – Even though ceramic knives are harder than traditional steel knives, they are also lighter. In fact, these ceramic knives are half the weight of most metal knives. Additionally, our knives have an ergonomic, arched handle, giving you excellent grip and control while cutting boneless meat, bread, fruits, and vegetables.

NON-REACTIVE BLADES – Ceramic knives have unique properties which make them resistant to oils and acids. Because of this, they are especially well suited for slicing boneless meat, vegetables, fruits, and bread. These knives are rustproof and stain resistant, and they won’t absorb any food elements. This means that the original taste, smell, and color of your food will be preserved after cutting.

STAYS SHARP LONGER THAN STAINLESS STEEL KNIVES – These ceramic knives are made of zirconia, which is second in hardness only to diamond. They are substantially harder than stainless steel knives, and retain their sharp cutting edge up to ten times longer than steel knives. Unlike steel knives, ceramic knives do not need to be regularly resharpened.

VERSATILE KITCHEN COMBO SET – This set of black ceramic cutlery comes with four different kitchen knives: a six inch bread knife with a serrated edge and French-style point, a six inch chef’s knife with triangular point, a five inch utility knife with triangular point, and a four inch fruit knife with a triangular point.
